main.bio: My name is Abhishek, I'm a Freelance Full Stack Android and Web Developer. Currently I'm an IT Student at KIIT University while also Freelancing
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: Current student working toward Information Technology Degree. Continuously working hard to upgrade my skills and experience. I have Experience of working with some startup as a intern and Freelancer which gave me real time working scenario and project management skill.

testimonials.text: To Whom It May Concern, this is to certify that, Mr Abhishek Adarsh Mishra has worked in BinaryDots Technologies private ltd for the period from 1st-Aug-2019 to 30th-Sept-2019. Over this period, he has participated in development of project FretBox. This project had excellent potential and learning. This project is successfully running online.  Mr Abhishek Adarsh Mishra has worked in my supervision and has shown a good example of learning. He is quick to learn and try new things, very dedicated and disciplined. Certificate = https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-JpFCClT0djdVOHHJ8NdIO8lV2zzbkHc/view?usp=sharing

This is to certify that Abhishek Adarsh Mishra, BTECH student of KIIT University, Bhubaneshwar has successfully completed his internship with VIBASU Career Accelerators Private Limited during the period May 11 2019 to July 10, 2019. During the period, he had worked on Development of Android Application. During the course of internship, Abhishek has shown great amount of responsibility, sincerity and a genuine willingness to learn and zeal to take on new assignments & challenges. In particular, his coordination skills and communication skills are par excellence and her attention to details is impressive. We wish him all the very best for his future. Certificate = https://drive.google.com/file/d/1cqtD-g66v0yZRZz1VSMN1_e8DYRkO9j3/view?usp=sharing
testimonials.user: Vipin Agarwal (Director VIBASU Career Accelerator Private Limited)
